abilities.name: Noxious Slipstream
abilities.description: Innate: Moving near a  champion grants Singed  20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. The effects of Noxious Slipstream can stack up to 25 times.
descriptions: Innate: Moving near a  champion grants Singed  20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. The effects of Noxious Slipstream can stack up to 25 times.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

abilities.name: Poison Trail
abilities.description: Toggle: Singed leaves a  poison cloud behind him for 3.25 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage per 0.25 Seconds:»5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 (+ 10% AP)«Total Magic Damage:40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 (+ 80% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage per 0.25 Seconds:»5 / 7.5 / 10 / 12.5 / 15 (+ 10% AP)«Total Magic Damage:40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120 (+ 80% AP)
descriptions: Toggle: Singed leaves a  poison cloud behind him for 3.25 seconds.
Enemies standing in the cloud's trail are  poisoned for 2 seconds, taking magic damage every 0.25 seconds for the duration, continuously refreshing while remaining in the affected area.

abilities.name: Mega Adhesive
abilities.description: Active: Singed covers the target area with a potent adhesive for 3 seconds,  slowing by 60% and  grounding all enemies within.
descriptions: Active: Singed covers the target area with a potent adhesive for 3 seconds,  slowing by 60% and  grounding all enemies within.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.description: Active: Singed  flings the target enemy over his shoulder, dropping at a location 550 units behind Singed's casting position after 0.75 seconds and dealing magic damage, capped against  minions and  monsters.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage:»50 / 65 / 80 / 95 / 110 (+ 6 / 6.5 / 7 / 7.5 / 8% of target's maximum health) (+ 75% AP)«Maximum Non-Champion Damage:350 / 365 / 380 / 395 / 410 (+ 75% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage:»50 / 65 / 80 / 95 / 110 (+ 6 / 6.5 / 7 / 7.5 / 8% of target's maximum health) (+ 75% AP)«Maximum Non-Champion Damage:350 / 365 / 380 / 395 / 410 (+ 75% AP)
descriptions: Active: Singed  flings the target enemy over his shoulder, dropping at a location 550 units behind Singed's casting position after 0.75 seconds and dealing magic damage, capped against  minions and  monsters.
Targets flung into  Mega Adhesive's area of effect are temporarily  rooted.

abilities.name: Insanity Potion
abilities.description: Active: Singed drinks a potent chemical brew, gaining  bonus ability power,  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance,  bonus movement speed,  bonus health regeneration, and  bonus mana regeneration, all for the next 25 seconds.
abilities.leveling:
Bonus Stats:30 / 45 / 60 / 75 / 90
Regeneration per Second:»6 / 9 / 12 / 15 / 18«Total Regeneration:150 / 225 / 300 / 375 / 450

name: Singed
title: the Mad Chemist
blurb: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledge—with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to...
